meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grand or magnificent.
meanings.sent1: The grandiosity of the castle took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The grandiosity of the mountain range was awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The grandiosity of the cake made everyone at the party gasp.
meanings.sent4: The grandiosity of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The grandiosity of the waterfall made it a sight to remember forever.

meanings.definition: An exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities.
meanings.sent1: His grandiosity led him to believe he was the best at everything.
meanings.sent2: Her grandiosity made her think she was the most talented person in the room.
meanings.sent3: His grandiosity about his cooking skills made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her grandiosity was like a bubble waiting to burst.
meanings.sent5: The grandiosity of his claims made everyone raise an eyebrow.
